attributes.action: End DWP Reconsideration project (mandatory nature) & make welfare appeals accessible.
attributes.additional_details: The DWP Recnsideration project must end as a mandatory imposition.  Claimants are entitled to appeal and must not be denied this by enforcing reconsideration (or as case often is justifying decision after automatically rejected).  Timing out appeal rights is unjust.  Withholding appeals is financial democide.  Culpability now.
